ygData.subject: RE: Change of name
ygData.msgSnippet:
Not to discourage u but using this kinda non-fantasy name, it may be 
changed by GM w/o ya knowledge, I read quite a few mails of such incidents 
happening.
ygData.messageBody:
Not to discourage u but using this kinda non-fantasy name, it may be
changed by GM w/o ya knowledge, I read quite a few mails of such incidents
happening. My RL friend, also kena name change by GM when he use a goon
name (something meaningless in RL, like those u select). GM told him "Very
creative name but not suitable, let me change it for you". He is still
lucky tat GM tell him personally, but many others' name kena change w/o
notice. They just login and find themselves 'another person' ;) Those
pple who kena complaints alot - esp those who make a name for the trade
skill service they provide, their customers no longer recognise or able to
find him.

Btw, GM didnt give my friend a choice when changing his name, he just give
him a msg, change his name (using the random name engine I guess) and
*poof*, gone! ;)

Good luck.

Ziltus

p/s: FYI, Garren's 2nd name is Irongrip, but I myself see another tank in
Lake Rathetear call Irongrip, ONLY Irongrip (1st name). I thot you cannot
select a 2nd name which other use it as a 1st name but seem like I'm wrong.
Anyway I have no intention to get a 2nd name now, I enjoy the secrective
indentity, esp when some lvl 20 casters behave yaya until they see my
spells, hahahaha ;) For those who wanna get or gonna get a 2nd name, try
to create a dummy char using that name 1st, at least it's safer. So now
there is 2 Irongrip in Innoruuk, I really dunno why these sex pervert like
to "grip' so much, hehe.

On Tuesday, 27 July, 1999 1:43 AM, Chen Lizhi
[SMTP:polarcoordinates@...] wrote:
> From: "Chen Lizhi" <polarcoordinates@...>
>
> I cannot use Veteran in Innoruk, cos my Druid in Cazic already called
> Veteran liao. I think I will name my char. Polar, last name Coordinates
:)
> If can I will stick to that, if cannot then I will be called Complex,
last
> name Number. Crazy right? I cannot think of any other liao. If you see
> someone with math like name in the game you know it's me liao. Look for a
> Halfling Druid.
>
